Event.name: Thwarting
Event.definition:
<def-root>In this frame a <fen>Preventing_cause</fen> interferes with the ability of a <fen>Protagonist</fen> to complete an intended <fen>Action</fen>. The <fen>Protagonist</fen> may not be mentioned in the sentence, in which case the <fen>Action</fen> is an endeavor that an individual or group of individuals hopes to accomplish. In this frame it is necessary that the <fen>Protagonist</fen> is unable to successfully complete the <fen>Action</fen>.
<ex> <fex name="Preventing_cause">Noriega's troops</fex> <t>foiled</t> <fex name="Action">a coup attempt</fex>. </ex> <ex> <fex name="Preventing_cause">He</fex> <t>prevented</t> <fex name="Protagonist">her</fex> <fex name="Action">from running away</fex>. </ex> <ex> <fex name="Protagonist">He</fex> was <t>foiled</t> <fex name="Action">in his attempt to overthrow the government</fex>. </ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Preventing_cause
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Preventing_cause</fen> is the agent or force who keeps the <fen>Protagonist</fen> from completing her or his planned <fen>Action</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Protagonist
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Protagonist</fen> is the individual or group of individuals who have a planned <fen>Action</fen> which is prevented by the <fen>Preventing_cause</fen> </def-root>

Arg.name: Action
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Action</fen> is the action or event certain individuals desire to bring about which is prevented by the <fen>Preventing_cause</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Manner
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Manner</fen> in which the <fen>Preventing_cause</fen> thwarts the <fen>Action</fen> of the <fen>Protagonist</fen>. <ex>He <fex name="Mnr">easily</fex> <t>thwarted</t> my plans.</ex></def-root>

Arg.name: Explanation
Arg.definition: <def-root>The <fen>Explanation</fen> for why or how the <fen>Protagonist</fen> and/or <fen>Action</fen> was thwarted by the <fen>Preventing_cause</fen>.</def-root>

Arg.name: Frequency
Arg.definition: <def-root>This FE is defined as the number of times an event occurs per some unit of time. A <fen>Frequency</fen> expression answers the question how often.</def-root>

lexUnit.name: thwart.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: prevent from succeeding in or accomplishing something.

lexUnit.name: stymie.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: prevent or hinder the progress of.

lexUnit.name: prevent.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: make unable to do something. (Different from Preventing.prevent.v)

lexUnit.name: forestall.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: anticipate and prevent the action of.

lexUnit.name: derail.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: cause to be unable to successfully complete

lexUnit.name: frustrate.v
lexUnit.definition: COD: prevent (someone) from doing or achieving something.

lexUnit.name: preclude.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: prevent someone from successfully doing something

lexUnit.name: counter.v
lexUnit.definition: FN: take action to prevent an opponent's action from succeeding; stop some SOA (either in progress or anticipated)
